to regain power , the former socialist has turned into a cynical political boss , chummy with corrupt reactionaries . he runs the Sandinista party a private fief .为了重掌大权，他已经由先前的社会主义者变为一个偾世嫉俗的政党领袖，和腐败的反动分子们有着亲密的关系，把桑解阵当作个人领地来经营。

entry.def: In former times, a fief was a piece of land given to someone by their lord, to whom they had a duty to provide particular services in return.

means.word_mean: 1. a piece of land held under the feudal system
